values: Hummm weddings springing up like flowers all over.  Babies all over the place hummmmm.....I want it. but oh well, I am always the bridesmaid never the bride.  Yet there is this constant ovr whelming feeling that the special someone is out there waiting and I am waiting to see if my Noah comes back.

I guess you could say that 2007 is off to a decent start.  I have my office job,  no weekends no holidays. And a job in a salon, working saturdays.  So I get to use my other schooling to help earn $$$$.  I wish MAtt would lay off the drugs though.

Something someone said hit me kinda hard the other day.  I did not appreciate being told by MD that he wouldn't talk to me as long as i was talking to Colin.  I wouldn't want to loose either of them, because the whole group of them are ignorant, immature and have problems manning up to be better ppl.  We all have our faults but why take your friends and accept them where they are at and then dump them when they cannot stand you anymore......

A real friend will challenge you to reach beyond where you are at because life isn't about staying the same and settling for second best.  (I got that from Andy Andrews, kinda. He says the guy at the drive thru of McDonalds can accept you where you are cuz he doesn't care....but your friends should care.)  

Well, I was taliking about Colin and complaining cuz I just don't understand our situation.  No one measures up to how I feel about him.  Its not how cute he is or that he makes me laugh... but a combination of everything that makes up what me happy.  But then why aren't we together.......well I got an answer I am not sure I like but am content with for now. .........

At least he love you enough not to get you tangled up in his world and drag you down to his level.

Yesterday I was on the check out lanes at work.  And i heard a little voice say " tell her mom...it is important."  She said okay...just a minute" as i looked up and with a smile and said "hi how are you this afternoon"  She said "my son wanted me to tell you, you are very pretty."  He looked about 3 years old....and came out from behind his mom to wave then went back to hiding.  It really made my dad.  Kids are so cute and honest.  I must be pretty right?  

And I am starting to think one of the sales floor team supervisors is coming to the service desk to see me.  He is kinda cute, but he was at the service desk since sunday than i have seen him since i started there.  And asked me to ring him up twice today...i am not a check lane. "But I am so nice and helpful all the time."   I was unaware he knew me well enough to make that call.  But hey.  Its flattering and i think it might have made me blush.  I am not used to compliments, anymore.  

I dunno I am trying to be healthier so that I loose weight.  I have a lot of events to look fwd to in the next year!

Well yet again Matt lets me down.  I do not know how many times I have dropped everything to help him out.  And he promised to give me a hand untill I got time to get my tire fixed.  And he leaves to go gamble.  What a great brother.  It makes me feel really special to be forgotten so he can go gamle with Robbie and Tim.  He can be so selfish and forget what others do for him.  But oh well.  Karma comes back to you.

I just want to punch someone in the face.  It would make me feel sooooooooooooooooooooo much better.  I hate the world today.  And I am trying to exhaust myself so I can't think or feel.  I thought about not getting out of bed at all today, but then again what good does that do?  It gives me more time to think....and i don't need to do that anymore.  

 

I want to hit someone who deserves it.  That actually could be some one whose name starts with a C and ends in am OLIN!  Or a M and end in ATTHEW....the list continues on and on.

Its an interesting sensation to believe in your heart that everything will be okay and work out the way it is supposed to but at the same time in your head be asking yourself...what the hell is going on.
"we are friends above all that, just remember that"
it rings thru my ears every time I start to get upset....just what he said to me at Mattapalooza. And I just looked at him, and it was one of the most important things that any one had ever said to me. It made all the drunken laughter and drinking games and stupid conversations mean something (not to mention the couple hook ups we had.) And it kinda validated the feelings i had had for soooooo long. Of course I let everything go that night cuz of all the drama i was dealing with.
Now I am just plain afraid of my feelings. All I can tell him is "you give me butterflies" and for so long I would not admit, even to myself, that I felt this way. And I am afraid to loose our friendship if I say anything more....what if he doesn't understand what i mean?  What if we aren't ready for this?  Yes, I have nothing to loose cuz I don't have him and I think things are just a dramatic disaster but I just can't say it.  I don't have the strength I don't feel it is the right time. ....
I called him today at work.  And asked about the DaVinci Code, we have wanted to go see it since before it came out and I think it has been an unspoken thing that we were going together.
He said maybe, which I took for a no. But he kept asking questions about work.....like we couldn't hang up.  Its like it has been searching for an excuse to engage in interaction.  Why are we doing this to ourselves and each other.
I know fear makes us all do fucked up things and push people away.  Yes I am afraid to have this feeling that I can't loose someone.  But I can't turn it off.  Yes, I am afraid it won't work out in the end, and Yes I know he isn't perfect but no I am not asking him to change who he is.  I just want to be the one to let him change what he wants to change.....HE has said it before but can't get there.  
I looked away
Then I look back at you
You try to say
The things that you can't undo
If I had my way
I'd never get over you
Today's the day
I pray that we make it through

Make it through the fall
Make it through it all

And I don't wanna fall to pieces
I just want to sit and stare at you
I don't want to talk about it
And I don't want a conversation
I just want to cry in front of you
I don't want to talk about it
Cuz I'm in Love With you

You're the only one,
I'd be with till the end
When I come undone
You bring me back again
Back under the stars
Back into your arms

Wanna know who you are
Wanna know where to start
I wanna know what this means

Wanna know how you feel
Wanna know what is real
I wanna know everything, everything 
Avril Lavegne

Okay maybe I am just delusioned by manipulation and successful attempts to get laid.  Maybe he is just like any other asshole I meet.  But I don't think so.  

SO all I can do is pray that it all works out and that I can have the strength to say what I need to wen the opportunity arises.

Thus anoher sad story in my no existant romantic love life.  And i don't know what is wrong if its me or whatever.
I know you can't make a person fall in love with you, or have feelings they just don't but you should treat a friend better then leading them on just to get some.  I mean please he could have called it honestly and I may have been game but talking about our connection and "the little things for eachother" thats just wrong.

And although I am really hurting and confused.  I am still okay with this and can tell myself everything will work out in the end.  And I can still say he gives me butterflies and that I am not sorry I feel the connection.  
It scares me to death to feel what I feel for him, and have felt for a long time.  I would like to turn it off but its not that easy.

I have this problem where if I want to know something I go looking for it.  I never snooped for gifts at Christmas I am talking about in a gossip realm and about ppl.  Well I was missing someone for quite sometime and all I wanted to do was know how he was doing.  I found my way thru google and well found his email address and used it.  I got a response and I thought that would be that.  Well now I really miss him, and hearing that he is doing alright makes me really miss him.  And I regret the way things happened.  We were never together and never really dated but he was that guy that was just special.  I miss him so much.  I would go to parties with his friends hoping to run into him.  Even when he had a girlfriend I was never jealous.  A few times he got me home safely after I had way too much to drink. And I just felt alive when he was around and talking to him well there may as well have been no one else in the room.  Well now I want to see him again.  And a part of me thinks that I should just never have sent an email.  I got a response back and we emailed a few times but I dunno.

i am not quite sure how i feel.  i know i have been on this almost high for almost 2 weeks.  its like a form of mania and i don't want it to go away.  but today i started to question if i am wrong for wanting to just forget someone all together or if it is just a test.  even if it is just to be a friend.  i don't know what i wanted or what makes me change my mind.  maybe neither is right.  how could i ever be a shrink.  i can't figure it all out.

but i am going to go back to school and i am going to get a certification and get my life on track.  i want kids before 30 or just not at all, so yeah.  i want a new car and i just want someone to matter to.  it was the coolest to hear the truth for once. but still i am questioning was it real?  how much should i hold back, or how much do you judt let someone in cuz you click?  its hard to just click so do you become bff if it fits and not think twice, and pray that if it is meant to be it will all come around right?  

i think this online diary stuff is a great way to allow people to unknowingly view your inner most thoughts.  i dunno.  this is all just crazy.....and what if you find out the one person you were venting about may have actually seen what was written kinda freaky.

<FONT color=#cc33cc>Christmas is such a boring tome this year but I am excited to be getting ready to move.  I need to get out an be forced to be more self sufficient.  Dependency does not work for me.  </FONT>

December 21st hummmmm 4 days till Christmas.  I think all my shopping is done considering I do not have the $$ to spend on anyone.  And I feel bad about that.  I have always enjoyed Christmas and giving gifts but this has been one hell of a year.  And I hope things get better really soon.  I have my resume out again.  And I keep hoping to find the right job, but I dunno.  I am reay to go with just a decent paycheck.  But who cares.  I am thinking about new years and I am not sure what we'll do.  But it beeter be fun.

Its always so nice to be able to stop wondering and start knowing.  In that wondering I think I ask myself to often what might have been?  But, the truth of it is that it wasn't.  It shouldn't have been so it wasn't.  We make choices that make the what might be the what wasn't and you can't take it back.  You can deal into the present and not let another what might have been happen.

I have been so upset about Brandon for so long that I think I forgot why I really was upset.  I was upset cuz he made me happy to be around him.  And having feelings made me get hurt, because I wasn't getting what I wanted when and how I wanted it. ......

I talked to him today and it made me smile.  I was really shocked when I listened to my voice mail and it was from him.But a good shocked.  Then we talked for a while.  And I really enjoyed talking to him.  I really wanted to make plans but I was afraid to be the one to start it off.  I am a little disappointed that he didn't came to my birthday party.....but I wouldn't have come if I were him either. 

I told him I was moving in with Matt.  He thought that might be cool.  I told him he needed his care bear.  He was like ummm yeah.  But I liked talking to him. 

Anyhow, I went to confession tonight and the priest I got was just really cool.  He asked what I wanted out of life....and I said a family and he said just pray for it.  I just left feeling like as far as the day went I was getting what i needed.

It was a lot of good things.  I invited my old Aesthetics instructor to lunch with me and Beth...It sounds like that brightened her day.  Sandy came in to get her hair cut....and I told her I would baby sit.  Just hearing all that has gone on in the past couple years for her makes me want to cry. But she is soooo cool about it.

I think I realized how lucky I really am today......I am not sure why.  Everyone has trials in his or her life but some are worse than others.  I have to count my blessings and some for those I love..........

So what if you were cheated on and left?  You don't have to live with the guilt of cheating.  You are free to love again with out the constant worry of will I loose it this time cuz Karma is coming to haunt you.

So what if your spouse or significant other is pissing you off?  At least he/she is alive and well, and able to annoy you.  What if you found out tommorrow he or she was dying of cancer and every moment was barrowed time?

So what if you have bills to pay, at least I you know you have people who care enough not to let you starve.  Besides it really doesn't matter how much money you make you can't take it with you to the next life.  Plus it burns up if lit on fire and cash doesn't have insurance.

Oh Damn!  I thought I had pushed all that stuff about him out of my mind, but for some reason I still find myself making my way into the shop to see him. I know he has a girlfriend and I am not into that I would never play that game cuz everyone gets hurt.  Even if you don't think you will.  Its not fair to anyone who is involved.  But he just has that smile, and that voice.  His looks are okay, and his body is well he is a little smaller than I like.  But still, he got my mind of Brandon temporarily.  And he made me realize how much I need someone.  But it doesn't matter cuz he is not available.  Then I think what the hell is he a player or is he just on heck of a guy.  

He was asking me about some damn doughnuts tonight and his birthday gift.....(take a trip to the storage closaet I'll give you a birthday present.)  His birthday was a few weeks ago though.  And never ever would that happen.  I was like what you need a damn dougnut I got you a muffin for your birthday.  He said no all i need is to see you today.  And its like WFT?  You have a girlfriend and he kept laying his head on my shoulder while reading the map.  Yeah he is my favorite.  But then again, I have the automatic BFF syndrome.  And maybe he just likes talking to me but the again he might be keeping his options over incase he and his girl start having problems.  I know he has been a big time cheater in the past...we talked about that and generalized sex and stuff one afternoon.  So we got kinda personal.....you know they say once a cheater always a cheater.  

Its just been way too damn long and I miss having someone.  I resent wasting my time and waiting on a so called good one, that I just want a bad boy where I can take a dive and worry about the consequences later, but damn I have a conscience.

went to see Harry Potter today.  It was the first one I have seen, and haven't read any books.  It was very interesting.  I went because I was attempting to be a better friend.  I realize that I have a selfish tendancy to only want to do what i want and show a lack of interest in what other people do.  So I am attempting to be better at understanding and diversity.  I had a very good experience this time.  

I figure I should self improve a little bit, it will make life better.  Get comfortable with my financial situation but not to comfortable and keep my eyes open for ways to settle down and start a family.  I think I am either too selfish about situations or WAY to giving.  I am practicing the balance thing.  Maybe I will stop doing that analyze every little detail and read the fuck into everything.  Somethings just happen and the reason for them is revealed later on...i just have to come to terms with that.

Also I talked to Michael to night...I think it has been like 5 years since I had to take him to the ER for over drinking.  He is starting school in knoxville in january.  one more unbad thing about the place.  I drove thru there to get my sister a few weeks ago.  And wondred if I could ever salvage any good memories or feel like going back.  The we got stuck in traffic for like an hour mid day....how ironic is that?  A chance to stop and think or a chance to get annoyed again?  Who cares.  

I have to get into my pictures and do a scrap book.  Its driving me nuts having all kinds of floating memories that I find at random times.  I just want it in order.  Next weeks to do list.  

Okay its bed time!

<FONT color=#6600cc>In everybad memory there is a calming voice and a soft touch.  If you stop and listen long enough, you can hear it, but becareful.  You might mistake what is being said.  You might miss it all together but its there.  Sometimes it takes hind sight to realize it was there and in a small way gets you thru.  But it does and you have to thank God it was there whatever it may have been.</FONT>

Lately I have been wondering why I get so angry about some things and why I have been unhappy.  I saw this picture that I thought was of Kevron and almost lost it a few weeks ago.  Work has driven me crazy for the last 2 years.  My family has driven me crazy.  A lot of stuff that has made me seem happy has actually probably not been in my best interest.  I have atleast quit drinking and stuff. 

I have figured out that usually if I am thinking about someone it is a good idea to call them or something. (Colin is a great example) And I have been thinking about this on friend a lot....well I decided that maybe I should try to contact him.  And just looked for an email address on the internet and hey what the hell all I had to loose was well nothing.  I regret that things got a little bit weird for a little while cuz of too much alcohol, but I am okay with it.  I am not angry and never was.

Plus, when I think of him I have this undescribable peaceful feeling in bad memories.  Its something I doubt he would ever know.   But I am glad that I have that.  So I emailed him at work.  Even if he doesn't send anything back I will be okay with that.

And sometimes I wonder whats really going on in my head.....and where it all comes from........

I was thinking about this guy and he is attractive, nice smile, fun to talk to yet surrounded by this essance (for lack of a better term) of straight up naughty boy.  Just like I like it, well not exactly but kinda.....I stood there thinking how meaningless I could make anything....and the All American Reject's song kept going thru my head......I'll keep you my dirty little secret......but I know that is not what I am looking for it never has been so I push the thought out of my head.  And keep on working, but he makes me laugh again.....and i start to think again...oh sweet jesus, if i never had to see him again or could just forget he had a girlfriend that he was in love with.........so I walk out of the room and pretend to be working.  And I don't think like this I have always thought about meaningful things and feelings and certainly not being a homewrecker, well except for this one time I let a guy kiss me who had a girlfriend but I felt guilty and they were pretty much searching for the reason to break up....I let him have the excuse......she thanked me later...so maybe it doesn't count. 

But at the same time I still think is there a "Karma" factor hanging over me???  I doubt it I think I have paid out more than my share of heartbreak.  But I don't think like that way.....I want a meaningful relationship....(thats the libra in me) something that can turn into a family and we can be happy...times like these that make me think that happily ever after is a load of crap and if I can't do the meaningful I would take and totally meaningless but absolutely incredible memorable and no strings attached...and again it takes me back to the kitchen...oh damn if I never had to see him again!  but I think I'll have to be good because the inevitable is that I would have to see him again and it probably wouldn't be that incredible.

Have you ever thought that maybe someone was secretly stalking you and you had no idea?  But that ever lingering presence bothers you in ways that you cannot describe?  Maybe they are not at your window or taping your phone but the ever improving technology is allowing them to invade your space from a safe distance.

Halloween was nothing special this year but oh well, there is always next year.  Dana said she went to a cool haunted house and actually got scared.  Maybe i will have to go visit her next year. 

I found out that I still might get that job that I want!  I am praying that it all works out.  I can hardly stand my job right now and I don't want to get another part time job untill I know whats going on with my other prospects.  I think Target looks pretty cool cuz I am moving in with my brother when his townhouse is done.  I need to get to a semi on my own place asap. 

The only thing that has been stable in my life since I have moved home is the unstablility.  And it makes me unhappy and depressed so i have to start changing that.  And I am going to plain and simple.  Living with Matt is probably not going to be great but it is a step in the right direction back toward independence.  Which i sooooo badly need.  Not being able to afford it is a bad excuse.  I am no longer comfortable with it.  If I can't afford groceries then I will just have to go hungry, and I will loose weight.

I had a lazy day today it was kinda nice.  Went to teach Sunday school and then came home...Ate lunch at Panera Bread with Kristen and the girls....wrote in my journal and laid around then went to church.  I didn't feel like going this morning.  My mom said she was sick.  Hummm....wonder why.

Yeah, I need to do laundry and clean a room or two, but i don't feel like it this is not my house and I don't have a place for myself.  I will have to decide where I live depending on where I end up getting a job.  Matts house will be ready in december.  I am not sure I can live with him, but at the same time it is a good spring board into  my own place.  I can start getting things together for myself....maybe get a puppy.  Matt said no but I can talk him into it...he told me I had to get a boyfriend first, but a puppy could kinda keep my urge wanting kids.  I am not ready to get married so I can't have kids yet.  Its all good.

Halloween is next weekend.  I kinda wanted to go out but I am not sure that will happen.  If FRHS is playing the state championship game on Sat I'll be in Chatanooga for most of the day.  Kristen is having a party for her little sister Sat night and I told her I would help her with it, but that was when it was going to be on a friday night.  I kinda want to go out myself Saturday, not entertain a bunch of 11 year olds.

I quit my horibble job at Bell friday.  I just got fed up and said I quit, and walked out.  I called the owner who in turn did not call me back as usual.  It felt good to get one stressor out of my life.  I had one good interview with an establish salon this week.  And I have another one on Thursday with another place.  Both of wich I would invite people to come see me at.  I would love to take clients to either.  Not so much the salons I have been at.  So things are looking up.

I feel kinda bad for my sister.  None of her friends asked her what she was doing for homecoming.  So she had no plans.  And it made her sad that her friends forgot about her.  I understand how she feels.  And it kinda puzzles me as to why her friends are that way cuz...she is always outgoing in an unabrasive way and makes everyone laugh.  But when it comes time to do stuff she is forgotten.  All her friends love to have her around, and have fun with her but I dunno.......maybe they just forget her or figure someone else has invited her.  I am going to see Elizabethtown with my two sisters and Kristen tonight.  That should cheer her up...she loves Orlando.

Saturday night was awesome.  Thank you to all my friends who played a part in my surprize party.  (Lindsey you got me back.)  I drank more than usual.  But thats okay it just happens sometimes. It is fun to talk about old times and play board games....boys verse girls. I was completely surprized, i didn't think Kristen had it in her. It was weird cuz Katie and Jason brought Emma (their baby) and well I dunno it was more than alright that she was there but thats the first peer group party that there was a child at.  Soon (hopefully) there will be more of those running around.

Your Birthdate: October 13
Being born on the 13th day of the month should help make you a better manager and organizer, but it may also give you a tendency to dominate people a bit. You may be more responsible and self-disciplined than you realize. Sincere and honest, you are a serious, hard working individual. Your feeling are likely to seem somewhat repressed at times. You are apt to be much more practical, rational, and conscious of details. Your intolerance and insistence on complete accuracy can be irritating to some.
What Does Your Birth Date Mean?

The Keys to Your Heart
You are attracted to those who are unbridled, untrammeled, and free. In love, you feel the most alive when things are straight-forward, and you're told that you're loved. You'd like to your lover to think you are optimistic and happy. You would be forced to break up with someone who was ruthless, cold-blooded, and sarcastic. Your ideal relationship is lasting. You want a relationship that looks to the future... one you can grow with. Your risk of cheating is zero. You care about society and morality. You would never break a commitment. You think of marriage as something precious. You'll treasure marriage and treat it as sacred. In this moment, you think of love as something you can get or discard anytime. You're feeling self centered.
What Are The Keys To Your Heart?

so i am one year older.  i was trying to lie about my age but that doesn't work.  i remember that i used to want to get older....i wish i would have enjoyed being a teenager longer.  i had the rest of my life to be over 21.  i do want a family and kids.  keith brough in the kids to get pizza tonight.  tyler and brandon are my lil buddies.  brandon got a hair cut and it is cute he is perfecting the art of making pizza.  tyler is a cutie too.  he is into soccer.  i would be a great soccer mom, but untill further notice i get to pretend on occassion!

<FONT color=#ffff00>So tommorrow i get to turn another year older.  i am not even 30 and yet i have a burning desire to lie about my age.  I am 21, again.  my uncle mike is in town and told my dad he wanted to take me out to dinner.  thats kinda nice i hardly ever get to see him anymore.  i was looking at this website at jobs and the idea of applying for this one in detroit looked so tempting.  but i am not sure why.  </FONT>

Take the quiz: "what kind of drug are you? (includes pictures)"

cocaine.
you are cocaine. addictive, expensive and confident. Drugs are bad but i thought it was kinda funny

Watching every motion
In my foolish lover's game
On this endless ocean
Finally lovers know no shame
Turning and returning
To some secret place inside
Watching in slow motion
As you turn around and say
My love

Take my breath away
Take my breath away

Watching I keep waiting
Still anticipating love
Never hesitating
To become the fated ones
Turning and returning
To some secret place inside
Watching in slow motion
As you turn around and say
My love

Take my breath away
Take my breath away

Through the hourglass I saw you
In time you slipped away
When the mirror crashed I called you
And turned to hear you say
If only for today
I am unafraid

Take my breath away
Take my breath away

Watching every motion
In this foolish lovers game
Haunted by the notion
Somewhere there's a love in flames
Turning and returning
To some secret place inside
Watching in slow motion
As you turn around and say
My love

alright this was the song that always came on when i gotupset or discouraged about a certain person.wwell I haven't heard this until today in a long time.  I was thinking again about him.  And I think it is totally unreasonable that I stilll have any sort of feeling for this person.  Even as a friend.  But I still do.  And to a degree it is pissing me off really bad.

Here goes another random life update.....

Told Jenger I would get Tyler and Brandon monday and take Tyler to soccer practice.  I guess I want to practice being a soccer mom.  I am not quite ready for my own kids yet.  It will come in due time.

I keep getting further and further behind in my bills.  So I need to find a way to pay them all at once so my money can be mine again like it was before these damn credit card companies made there way to college campuses to scam niave college students into signing away their credit.  Not to mention the damn student loans.  I am allowed to return most merchandise I do not want because it doesn't work.  I wish I could return my worthless UT education.  I am one credit shy of my degree and don't want to go back.  All I did was regurgetate what the professors wanted to hear.  I don't believe in most of what I was "taught"

Might go visist Katie Jason and baby Emma friday...yeah I think I will.  I don't see them enough.

Kristen quit work today.  For the wrong reasons I think.....right idea though.

Melissa made me a pizza for lunch today.  I took her to work with me she got to see how boring it is.

Beth called me all upset cuz of how her family treats her.  It was especially bad today cuz her brother and sister in law had their baby today and she felt as though she was left out of the whole thing.

Dana and I won't get to go to Green Day after all.  She has to work and I think the show is sold out.  SO I suggested we go to Memphis to see Rob Thomas.  Only problem is it is the same weekend as the High School State Soccer Tourniment.  I promised I would go see that. 

I am debating the notion of signs all around us.  I stumbled across something intreging.  I do not want to read into it, but I dunno. 

Marcus called to say Colin was home from the hospital.  I called and told Colin to call me if he needed anything.  I doubt he would, he wouldn't want me to go out of my way, or be indebted.  Even though it is not a burden nor would he owe me.

I am tired but don't want to sleep.  I better make some money at work tommorrow.  Thursdays have been great days for me so far.  Lets not ruin it now.  I have to remember to get new car tags tommorrow.  I keep putting it off.

There is this song I have on a tape..yes a tape somewhere that I loved.  It isn't on an album, its called Am I Wrong by Brand New.  Its a really cool song.  I wish I had it on CD.  Speegle said he bet he could find it on one of the Brand New CDs but he never did.  
I think of it when I think about Andy, who I started thinking about in the last couple days.  Maybe it was just the idea of almost loosing a friend I hadn't talked to in a long time.  But I made the decision that I shouldn't talk to him anymore because I knew we were never going to be together but we couldn't be just friends.  Its too intense of a relationship that I don't even think we could understand.  I am never okay with his girlfriends and he never acts like he wants to hear about my dates or interests.  But there isn't much of a good reason for that.  But talking to him fucks up my feelings about others.  I was at a point where I couldn't have my feelings messed with.  So now I wonder if I am wrong, but I am not sure.

After teaching CCD matt and I went to the hospital to see Colin.  He is doing alright.  We finally got the story of what happened.  Some guy decided to smash him with a car.  Talk about anger management issues.  I felt better seeing for myself that he was not dying, cuz you never know what to believe especially when Marcus is telling a story.  He had me so scared that Colin was DYING yesterday.  That I had to see for myself.  I met his bro Chandler.  He seems like the kind of person I would be friends with.  He was talking about how the who group needed to grow up and Colin needed better friends, and how hard it was to be around them if they were drinking.

Matt kinda hurt my feelings this morning.  I asked if the hospital had any rules about sandals...so i would not be allowed to go see him.  Matt said "no but you might not be allowed to se him cuz he doesn't want you there cuz he doesn't like you."  I almost stayed home.  I am really sensative about that kinda stuff.  Matt ought to know that by now.  He was like you need to take a joke.  I know I am stupidly sensative about stuff like people acting one way to your face and another while you aren't around.  I just don't want to be somewhere I am not wanted. 

So I was really quiet on the way there and when we got there.  Colin didn't seem to acknowledge I had walked in with M and M.  So I just sat down.  When his intro chit chat was done with he looked at me and smiled saying...we know how I am; what have you been up to?  And me saying nothing was not exactly the answer he was looking for.  Then the girl he is talking to showed up.  I am not so sure about her.  She is nice enough and I hope it works out for them but I dunno.  He is just a better guy than he will ever give himself credit for and guards his feelings so much that I don't think many people see how big his heart is.

Its funny how less than 24 hours ago I was writing an entry on feelings about making connections, and the phone conversation I had with my brother before work.

Matt never calls early in the morning unless he needs a ride or is introuble or needs me to do him a favor.  Well he asked if I was working and informed me that someone had gotten hurt last night.  I figured it was not someone I knew.  But he told me Colin had gotten run over by a car.  I don't think it set in.  I offered to miss work so that I could take him to see him to.  (We haven't talked in over a year and I had wanted to call him this week but figured he didn't want to talk to me.)  Matt said he wasn't sure how bad it was and that he might die.  Then my mom came home and was upset too.  (Our family likes Colin he was an original Matteo's employee.)  I almost cried and I almost cried on my way into work.  But I went cuz Matt said I didn't need to worry.  He and I would go back later to the hospital.

My mom called me later to say he was in okay condition it was his leg and he had been in surgery for that.  And I think that is when it sank in how much I actually care about Colin, as a friend.  It is a weird sort of connection.  He has always had this way of just making me smile.  He has always been a friend.  And dispite his rough edges he is a really good person.  (with a bad temper) He can just look up across the room and smile at me if I was mad and I would start to laugh.  He cheats at cards and drinking games and everyone cracks up.  

At "mattapalooza" he was hittin' on this chick and I was wasted.  I said don't want to cock block you.  He said ain't like that girl we're friends first, before any of this.  He said it infront of her.  And I was glad to hear it.  It made me feel really important.  Because we are friends and too many guy friends have made me feel unimportant over a chance to get laid.  I think I would take it really hard if anything happened to him.  I really want him to know I luv him.  And for all I know this is a pile of crap and it was a statement to keep me from going psycho.  And I have a false sense of friendship but oh well.

Its strange how in the last few months I have just been having these weird memories of people and unshakable desire to "reconnect" with them.  I think I get those feelings for a reaason.  Like they need a friend or I do.  Thanks to myspace I got intouch with a friend from high school.  I have been trying to let go of those feelings, and I get urges to call people and try to ignore them.  But the curiosity only grows stronger.  And I give in and feel like a total dumb ass.  But I shouldn't maybe so sure that I am wrong.  I like connecting with people thats what i do....I am so often the automatic BFF.  I don't get why some people can't trust me though when I want them to.  Its a baggage thing I guess.

Speaking of...I think I have gotten my emotional baggage just about to carry on capacity (thanks for the phrase Dana).

I actually made money this weekend.  It was such a great weekend.  I really like what I do, as far as Aesthetics goes.  There is some good money and it can really help people to relax and look better.  Which I enjoy.  I think it is helping me that I have finally taken to heart that idea that if you act like you don't need the $ it is easier to make.  

Anyhow, I had a great week.  Lindsey and I had Olive Garden on Wed.  Friday Ashley and I had Margaritas and went to the fabric store.  I get into that funk when I am being a recluse.  Oh yeah Dana and I talked and I think we are going to go to see Green Day on Oct 16th for our birthdays.  Anyone else wanna go??  Its on a sunday night is the only problem but who cares last year we saw Story of the Year that was a fun show.  We couldn't get drunk which I dunno it was good and it was bad.  

I am starting to look for signs way too much and I just need to trust my instincts more and stop being overly logical.  It has never gotten me anywhere.

I get to be a teacher again!  Kristen and I have 12 kids in our CCD class.  They all seem like alright kids.  Except one...Kristen already wants to have him sit out in the hall.  But thats okay he just needs some attention.  Matt has a class also.  I think it is great that he is getting involved.  He stayed for church too which is even better.

Not that I am a Jesus Freak but I do believe in God and I have faith.  God won't lead us to do anything wrong and if we listen closely enough I think he gives us the answers....just not the ones we want all the time.  As for my brother, he makes so many bad choices he needs a stable thing like going to church to get him on a

I had an incredibly interesting weekend.  I offered to help Jenger with the boys this weekend.  So I kinda got to play soccer mom, Tyler had a tournement.

I worked Saturday morning.  Had one apt.  picked the kids up from another parent. took them to lunch and the second soccer game.  Lil' brandon was sick and cranky all afternoon, and fell asleep in the car on the way home.  Keith picked them up earily.  I talked to kristen and aaron and we decided to see a movie.  Then called brandon.  I dunno if I regret it or not.  

Went to see Brothers Grimm...cool movie.  Nothing spectacular, but good.  It was fun to kinda just go out.  Went home and went to bed.  Had trouble getting up, I guess I was just tired.  But got over to get the kids and woke keith up...guess everyone had a long week.

Keith left the check book to go grocery shopping.  So we went to do that and got tyler ready for his game which was over before we got to, someone gave me the wrong time.  So the kids took me to see Valient.  Another cute movie.  Tyler had cut a chunk out of Brandon's hair that morning and Brandon ran and hid from me which scared the hell out of me.  

Then I had a terrible night working at Matteo's.  Went home to sleep.

Had a family day today.  saw matt's house, celebrated katie's birthday, shopped.  I bought a book, I am going to read it.  Then went walking with Kristen for like 2 hours.  

I think I am going to have a good week.

Signs are everywhere.  Sometimes I wonder how many times I have to say if this completely random thing happens I should.....(fill in the blank) I bellieve it makes it a sign but why did I want a sign?  Is is to say I should do something I had every intention of doing anyhow?  Or is it cuz I was hell bent on doing something because I am supposed to do it, I just needed to wait on the timing thing.

Its been about a week with out an update....so here goes life,

I made a few dollars at work last week more than usual.  Maybe things will start picking up.  I just have to wait.  To build a clientel.  It kinda comes natural I like people, and helping them.  A facial is better medicine than a therapist sometimes.  And everyone needs a good waxing.  (Especially if they relate with those of us who have hairy complexes.)

I talked to Marcus for a minute the other day and he always makes me laugh.  Talked to my sister Liz at college.  She is a little homesick but doing very well.  She is a great writer and her teacher knows it. 

Decided to teach a CCD class at church with Kristen.  My brother is actually going to do it also.  I think it will be good for him.  he says it may make him go to church as well.  He needs something in his life.  It should be fun, I like kids and once a week with a class of middle schoolers will be my fill.

I helped Jenger out with her boys for 2 days last week.  Its fun to take a 3 year old shopping and have all the old lady clerks tell you how precious he is....although he is not mine.  My brother wants to take him to be his lost child to pick up chicks.  Whatever...he thinks it would be fun, and something boys just do.  And I like picking up a 2nd grader too, and hearing about his day.

One day I attempted to perfect my cooking skills and make a roast in the crock pot.....everyone ate it up.

Went to work out with Kristen cuz I need it.  She motivates me.

Chrissie called me Saturday all upset cuz both her and her sister may have thyroid cancer.  I wasn't sure how to respond.  Chrissie and I have a weird relationship where we don't hang out a lot but everyonce in a while we are just the break the other needs.  I felt bad thinking about my problems.  None of them were life or death.  I dunno.

Dana and I talked a lot on the phone and online...I miss the online chat it up days.  Well kinda....I miss the wrecklessness I had in college.  But I don't feel bad about my life cuz I have come to realize we all have debt and regret and very few people are ever what we all strive to be in sucess.  They have lost goals and make mistakes too.

Ever had one of those friends that just comes to mind everyonce in a while?  Not for a good reason or a bad one but its always a welcome thought?  I had one of those the other day.  It was one of those guys that I always had a little bit of a crush on.  I never thought about dating really, but I wouldn't have minded and I did always want him not to have a girlfriend.

I met him thanks to joel, the night he had to be the "witness" to chris's car accident and try to look all cool infront of his new frat "lil" brother.  And in the end I had to save joel and make him look like a not total looser.  I enjoyed it when Kelly was around.  When ever I was out totally wasted, and ran into him, he had this way of making sure I got home safely. 

One time we were at this hug house party where Dana ended up jumping out the second story window to avoid the cops.  I ran into him at, he tried to get me to leave with him and the rest of the TKEs that were there so I would avoid the cops.  Instead I just called after having to run from the party to get a ride to drink more.  But it was a lot of fun.  He saved me from the dumb ass who thought every girl wanted him by taking me to his dorm.  Then walked me home cuz blinky wouldn't get me cuz I lost my student ID.  I insisted it wasn't necessary but Kelly did.  He told me he knew I could take care of myself but he had a sister.  Then I fell asleep on his lap watching tv after we finished the last of the liquor in the cabinent. 

Although he was kind of a stoner he was really smart and ended up getting into vet school at like Georgetown.  And he was fun.  I just wonder what he is up to these days and i hope he is doing al right.

So life is looking even brighter today...not totally but starting to look better and I am starting to see a light at the end of the tunnel.  At work I told my boss how he needed to run a special.  He said yes.  My old job wants me to come back and work there part time.  If I do it will be on my terms.  Because I have to look out for me and thats the way life has to go.  

Taylor reminded me that it was Ryan's birthday very soon. And in a weird way this is about the point when Ryan always pops back into my life.  When things are getting better and I am still a little confused.  He's that friend, the one that is always a near miss at just the right time and I am not sure if it is a good think or a bad thing.  I am indifferent on it.  

Beth and I talked till almost 2 this morning.  We just kinda understand were each other are coming from on certain issues. She is like "I can't get over Clayton even though he is a Narissist that is incapable of a relationship.

My sisters are all in school....I feel so old at times.  But oh well.  I was looking at the Myspaces of people I went to high school with and not many of them are accomplished much.  So I don't feel so bad.  

I heard some grat stories about my boss today and passed employees.  They made me laught

I am done being pissy and mad at the world.  I am thinking that the spa industry is rather shady though.  But I am getting some on call work at a few places which is cool.  And I get to help Jenger out with her boys a little bit too.  Kristen taught me how to make some really good fried chicken last night and we baked some cookies.  I like cooking and being domestic. I love working but I don't want to have to do it.  I get bored just sitting even if it is hourly.  I could work 10 hours a day if I could keep busy and make the commission off it.  Its the waiting and building a cliental I can't take but I have to stick it out.  

I get a chance to talk to my sister on line while she is at college.  I am so proud of her that she is away and doing alright so far.
